user_instruction: 'Prepare a detailed response to the team leaders'"'"' request for a performance and budget report. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Updated Performance Metrics & Budget Overview

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Mark and Sarah have asked me to compile a detailed performance and budget report for their upcoming resource-planning review. Could you please share the latest:

• Performance metrics for the Software Development and Digital Marketing teams (key KPIs, quarterly trends, and any noteworthy highlights)  
• Current budget utilization and remaining allocations for each team (including any pending PO commitments)

If it’s easier, you can find the specific data points we need outlined in the Notion page “Q3 Team Performance & Budget” and in the recent Gmail thread titled “Metrics & Budget Inputs – Q3.” Feel free to drop the numbers directly into that Notion doc or send them over in a spreadsheet—whichever is most convenient for you.

We’d like to finalize the report by next Wednesday, so receiving the information by end of day Monday would be ideal. If there are any confidentiality considerations or additional approvals required, just let me know and we can adjust accordingly.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
